courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, sophomore level
courses.description: Zero-credit course for students receiving pay/stipends for participation in VIP courses.  Students held to same grading standards as VIP 2601/2602; can participate multiple semesters; no volunteers.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, sophomore level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research. Can participate multiple semesters. Students will familiarize themselves with project, gain knowledge/skills, and begin making meaningful contributions.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, sophomore level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research. Can participate multiple semesters. Students will familiarize themselves with project, gain knowledge/skills, and begin making meaningful contributions.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, sophomore participation
courses.description: Multidisciplinary, project-based, team-based course supporting faculty research. Students can participate multiple semesters.  2000-level students will: familiarize themselves with project, gain knowledge/skills, and begin making meaningful contributions.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, sophomore level research
courses.description: Course for students participating in VIP as part of a paid undergraduate research program.  Students held to same standards as in VIP 2601/2602.  No volunteers.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, junior level
courses.description: Zero-credit course for students receiving pay/stipends for participation in VIP courses.  Students held to same grading standards as VIP 3601/3602; can participate multiple semesters; no volunteers.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, junior level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research.  Can participate multiple semesters. Students will have foundations within discipline, pursue needed knowledge/skills, make meaningful contributions, and assume technical/leadership responsibilities.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, junior level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research.  Can participate multiple semesters. Students will have foundations within discipline, pursue needed knowledge/skills, make meaningful contributions, and assume technical/leadership responsibilities.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, junior level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research.  Can participate multiple semesters. Students will have foundations within discipline, pursue needed knowledge/skills, make meaningful contributions, and assume technical/leadership responsibilities.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, senior level
courses.description: Zero-credit course for students receiving pay/stipends for participation in VIP courses.  Students held to same grading standards as VIP 4601/4602; can participate multiple semesters; no volunteers.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, senior level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research. Can participate multiple semesters. Students will have strong foundations within discipline, pursue further knowledge/skills, make meaningful contributions, and assume significant technical/leadership responsibilities.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, senior participation
courses.description: Multidisciplinary, project-based, team-based course supporting faculty research. Students can participate multiple semesters.  4000-level students will: have strong foundations within their disciplines; further pursue needed knowledge/skills; make meaningful contributions; take on significant responsibilities in technical areas and/or team leadership.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, senior participation
courses.description: Multidisciplinary, project-based, team-based course supporting faculty research. Students can participate multiple semesters. 4000-level students will: have strong foundations within their disciplines; further pursue needed knowledge/skills; make meaningful contributions; take on significant responsibilities in technical areas and/or team leadership.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, senior level research
courses.description: Course for students participating in VIP as part of a paid undergraduate research program.  Students held to same standards as in VIP 4601/4602.  No volunteers.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, capstone
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research.  Restricted to students using VIP to fulfill junior or culminating design requirements, as permitted by degree program.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, graduate level
courses.description: Zero-credit course for graduate students receiving pay/stipends for participation in VIP projects. Students can participate multiple semesters. Volunteers are not permitted.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, graduate level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research. Students can participate multiple semesters.  Graduate students will pursue needed knowledge/skills; make meaningful contributions; provide leadership in technical areas/team management.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project: Multidisciplinary project-based team, graduate level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research. Students can participate multiple semesters.  Graduate students will pursue needed knowledge/skills; make meaningful contributions; provide leadership in technical areas/team management.

courses.title: Vertically Integrated Project:Multidisciplinary project-based team, graduate level
courses.description: Multidisciplinary course supporting faculty research. Students can participate multiple semesters. Graduate students will pursue needed knowledge/skills; make meaningful contributions; provide leadership in technical areas/team management.
